mapper.select: select id, uid, name, content, createTime, updateTime, count from (select id, uid, postId, content, createTime, updateTime from supports WHERE postId = #{id} and isDeleted = 0) as s natural join (select id as uid, name FROM users) as u left join (select supportId, count(*) as count from comments where isDeleted = 0 group by supportId) as c on c.supportId = s.id order by createTime limit #{from}, #{to};
mapper.insert: insert into supports(id, uid, postId, content, createTime, isDeleted) values (null, #{uid}, #{postId}, #{content}, current_timestamp, 0);
mapper.update: update supports set isDeleted = 1 where id =#{id} and uid=#{uid};
